name: Attack on the Dreadnought
description:
Attack on the Dreadnaught is a game about a massive spaceship classified as a dreadnought. The player is a lone ship sent to destroy the dreadnought class ship. The player’s ship is fitted with double firing blasters and a missile system. Although the player has enough firepower to destroy the dreadnought, it has 2 sets of 4 turrets on each side of the ship that will attack the player.

Press ESC to see controls.
